translation.appSubTitle: Drop any files to any devices on your LAN
translation.crossPlatformDetails: We mean it—iOS, Android, macOS, Windows, Linux, Android TV, and more. LANDrop works seamlessly across all major platforms.
translation.ultraFastSecureDetails: LANDrop uses advanced protocols to deliver line-rate transfer speeds along with military-grade encryption and authentication for top-notch security.
translation.noDataUsageDetails: On the go? No worries—LANDrop works with your personal hotspot, without using cellular data.
translation.losslessTransfersDetails: LANDrop transfers your photos and videos without any compression, ensuring they remain high quality.
translation.nearbySharingDetails: LANDrop can detect nearby devices even if they're not on the same Wi-Fi network. Using WebRTC, it enables file transfers to those devices.
translation.trustedDevicesDetails: Add trusted devices in LANDrop and automatically accept file transfers from them without needing approval each time.
translation.featuresDetails: LANDrop automatically detects other devices running LANDrop on the same Wi-Fi network, so you don't need to enter IP addresses manually. Unlike other apps, there's no need to set up a server. LANDrop handles everything behind the scenes—just like AirDrop, but cross-platform.

translation.appSubTitle: 跨平台局域网文件传输工具
translation.crossPlatformDetails: 我们支持 iOS、Android、macOS、Windows、Linux、Android TV 等操作系统。LANDrop 在所有主要平台上无缝运行。
translation.ultraFastSecureDetails: LANDrop 使用先进的协议，提供满速传输，并采用军用级加密和身份验证，确保一流的安全性。
translation.noDataUsageDetails: 在外面？不用担心——LANDrop 可通过个人热点工作，无需使用移动数据。
translation.losslessTransfersDetails: LANDrop 传输您的照片和视频时不进行任何压缩，确保它们的高质量。
translation.nearbySharingDetails: 即使不在同一 Wi-Fi 网络上，LANDrop 也可以检测到附近的设备，并通过 WebRTC 向它们传输。
translation.trustedDevicesDetails: 您可以在 LANDrop 中添加信任设备，自动接受这些设备的文件传输，而无需每次都进行确认。
translation.featuresDetails: LANDrop 会自动检测同一 Wi-Fi 网络上的其他 LANDrop 设备，因此您无需手动输入 IP 地址。LANDrop 会在后台处理一切——就像一个跨平台的 AirDrop 一样。
